wakakka.. There goes hafidz!! Talking crap all the way!! haha.. Okies.. I'm soo happy that this is created!! Yea!! Finally it's done!! haha.. hmm.. okies.. let's all listen to my grandfather, grandmother story okie!! wakakka.. Once upon the afternoon, i woke up in the evening.. It was around 11 am.. Wif no breakfast for my breakfast.. haha.. went to bathe den on the computer.. Sit at the chair.. and shake my legs when suddenly!! Somebody need my help!! i went to help him to my rescue!! And by the end of today, i had to help him for more then 5 times.. He had so much rescuing needed!! haha.. Okies.. Well, here i go.. Talking craps again.. wkakaka.. okies.. Actually i wanted to say, i want to open a 'Blog Helping' company.. hahahahaha.. Well, now blogger is becoming more popular..!! Mostly everyone around the world is using.. haha.. but it's true.. Blog is an online diary which tells everyone what is heppening to his or her life in a day.. muahahha.. Dah cam advertising utk blog seh!! haha.. Boing boing boing.. my internet sikit sot la.. Boring seh.. Cannot open internet explorer tapi nadera always ader cara!! haha.. i use kazaa nye web.. haha.. now, i can play internet!! Soo clever.. haha.. Everyone ader cara kan.. Nadera nye style style.. hahahaha.. Okies. u all write okies.. Wanna watch cinta bollywood now!! wakakkaka.. Toddles!!

wahahahahhahaah.... first of all.. i would like to say thank you to all my fans in Singapore n aso other countries for my winning of grammy awards for the best actor... hahahahaha... wAt a cRaP tHeRe!!.. haha.. nah.. actually n especially to nadera for makin tis blog all by herslef..

Haha.. *no offense!* Amy, have you watch spiderman 2? I wanna watch la.. Nanti if i come back later kan.. Cam smua org beratur nak dpt ndp tickets seh!! Is spiderman really that good? i wanna watch la!! Ader org nak tgk wif me tak?! keke.. Okies.. So yesterday yesterday, my internet was fix..!! Thanki u abg shahril!! hehe.. Okies.. i was so busy yesterday..!! Then today i went out again wif my frens.. Yesterday, my skool ader speech day.. i went.. Of cuz i went.. But then right, i just did wat im suppose to do n then i went to sit sit wif Fadilah n Syuhadah.. We tok tok.. Makdi, NaDeRa bebual singlish seh!! keke.. Though im suppose to do the rest of ma duties, i didn't do it.. i went missing instead.. But then right, not even one counciler noe i was even missing.. Isn't that great!! keke.. Then today, i went out.. I went to clementi.. Gi ginza wif Zuhairah.. Den meet Atiqah under her blok.. We decide to study.. Tapi kan.. Either one of us brought a book.. Cam ner nak belajar kalau tak de buku.. kekek tul.. haha.. Den i went to orchard wif this guy.. Eep! This guy's name cannot be mention la.. haha.. Okies.. We went to orchard coz im dead bored.. Then went home taking the bus.. He sent me home.. Under my blok.. So sweet! Then he go home i tink.. He's really charming.. Maybe he's my prince charming.. Maner tahu ehk.. I may never noe..!! hehe.. Then i went home la.. Then im here.. Sitting here in my chair.. Writing for this blog.. Yea, i agree wif amy that this blog is kinda deserted..!! hmm.. Nak letak lagu.. Malas lak nak gi template.. Im quite busy la amy.. Maybe next week ya!! Okies.. So everyone.. Gd nite n haf sweet dreams..!!
